---
category: news
title: "Kitware Awarded DARPA Contract to Improve Vision and Perception for Underwater Robotic Systems"
excerpt: "Kitware Inc. has been awarded a contract by the Defense Advanced Research Project Agency (DARPA) in support of its Angler program. Angler aims to pioneer the next generation of autonomous underwater robotic systems capable of navigating the deep sea while surveying large areas and physically manipulating objects on the seafloor."
